title: Console Finances
desc: Using JavaScript concepts to create a financial analysis tool.

title: Weather Dashboard
desc: A weather dashboard app that allows the users to see the weather forecast for cities of their choosing.

title: Javascript Quiz
desc: A Coding Quiz Challenge App that challenges the user to try to answer JavaScript code-related questions within the time limit. You get one point for each correct answer but keep in mind that incorrect answers will penalize your time by ten seconds!

title: Password Generator
desc: An app to generate a random password based on user criteria

title: Workday Scheduler
desc: A simple calendar application that runs in the browser. It allows a user to save planned events for each hour of the day.

title: Team Generator
desc: This is a Node.js command-line application. This application will take in information about employees on a software engineering team, then generates an HTML webpage that displays summaries for each employee.

title: The Mixologist
desc: This web application uses the thecocktaildb api to search and present details on your favourite cocktails.

title: Hello Movie
sdesc: A Movie and TV recommendation App
desc: This application is built in React 18. Its purpose is to suggest recommendations for movies or TVs shows based on a free text search you input.
